title: Fix green check mark circle transparency

requirements.summary: Remove transparency from green check mark circles in CheckInButton so the circle background is fully opaque
acceptanceCriteria: The green check mark circle background is fully opaque with no visible transparency.
Content or UI elements beneath the circle are not visible through it.
The green color and check mark icon remain visually consistent with the existing design.

file_operations.description: Modify the checked-in state button styling to remove any transparency or opacity from the green circle background. Ensure the background color uses a fully opaque value (e.g., change from bg-green-500/90 to bg-green-500, or adjust any opacity property to 1.0). Verify that the circle remains 44px in size, retains the check mark icon, and maintains visual consistency with the existing design while making the background completely opaque so no underlying content is visible through it.
